text: It should be noted that no differences in the site and pattern of disease recurrence were observed between the two treatments.Another identified study1713 evaluated the efficacy of CCRT with curative intent in patients with FIGO stage IVB cervical cancer initially presenting with para-aortic and left supraclavicular LN metastases (groupe I) and compared these findings with those in patients with PALN without left supraclavicular LN metastases who received extended-field CCRT (group II).
